sources.title: The Walking Hills (1949)
sources.description: A study in greed in which treasure hunters seek a shipment of gold buried in Death Valley. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-walking-hills-1949/

metadata.Plot: A long-lost gold treasure, believed buried in the sand dunes of the fabulous Walking Hills, attracts adventurers Jim Carey (Randolph Scott), a rancher; Shep (William Bishop), rodeo rider wanted for murder; Old Will (Edgar Buchanan); Chalk (Arthur Kennedy); Frazee (John Ireland), a detective hunting Shep; Johnny (Jerome Courtland), a cowboy and Josh (Josh White), an entertainer. Uninvited, Chris Jackson (Ella Raines, loved by both Jim and Shep, joins the treasure-hunters. Hard work, suspicion, danger and intrigues and hatreds culminate in a grim fight with shovels, and a raging desert sand-storm leads to the conclusion.
metadata.Actors: Randolph Scott, Ella Raines, William Bishop
